biocontainers.name: tidehunter
biocontainers.summary: Efficient and sensitive tandem repeat detection from noisy long reads using seed-and-chain

biotools.summary: efficient and sensitive tandem repeat detection from noisy long-reads using seed-and-chain | TideHunter is an efficient and sensitive tandem repeat detection and consensus calling tool which is designed for tandemly repeated long-read sequence (INC-seq, R2C2, NanoAmpli-Seq)

bioschemas.name: TideHunter
bioschemas.summary: efficient and sensitive tandem repeat detection from noisy long-reads using seed-and-chain | TideHunter is an efficient and sensitive tandem repeat detection and consensus calling tool which is designed for tandemly repeated long-read sequence (INC-seq, R2C2, NanoAmpli-Seq)
